error.serverError: Oops! Something went wrong, please try again.

app.processing: This won't take too long. Please wait.

dashboard.planOnHoldMessage: Your plan's on hold. Please top up soon.

error.lockedAccount: Your account has been locked. Please call 777.
error.disabledAccount: Your account has been disabled. Please call 777.
error.errorLoggingIn: Sorry, we can't sign you in right now. Please try again later.
error.invalidCredentials: Your sign in details are invalid.
error.sessionTimeout: Sorry, we've signed you out to keep you secure. Please sign in again.

newCard.saveCardDisabled: Save my card (You can only save a maximum of 10 cards)
newCard.maxCardsExceeded: You can only save a maximum of 10 cards

paymentMethods.noSavedCards: You don't have any cards saved
paymentMethods.maxCardsLimitReached: You can only save a maximum of {{maxCards}} cards

outOfPlanSpend.none: You do not have any out of plan spend

topUpSelector.title: Top up
topUpSelector.processingPayment: This won't take too long. Please wait.

error.card: Your top up wasn't successful. Please check your card balance and try again.
error.newCardAndSave: Your top up wasn't successful. Please check your card balance and try again. We also haven't saved your card details.
error.generic: Oops! Something went wrong, please try again.

error.length: Please enter all 12 digits of the recharge voucher number, including any zeros
error.empty: Please enter the recharge voucher number
error.invalid: Sorry, this recharge voucher number isn't valid. Please check it and try again.
error.used: Sorry, this recharge voucher number has already been used. Please get a new voucher.
error.expired: Sorry, this recharge voucher number has expired. Please get a new voucher.
error.inactive: Sorry, this recharge voucher number isn't active. Please get a new voucher.
error.maxBalance: Sorry, this voucher top up can't be processed because it will exceed your maximum balance limit.
error.internalError: Sorry, but our online voucher top up isn't currently available. Please FREE TXT the recharge voucher number to 887 to top up.
error.temporary: Sorry, but our online voucher top up isn't currently available. Please try again later or FREE TXT the recharge voucher number to 887 to top up.
error.barredCall: Sorry, but you can't top up this mobile number at the moment. Please try again later.
error.barredSubscriber: Sorry, but you can't top up this mobile number at the moment. Please call 777.

yourAccount.noSavedCards: You don't have any cards saved

notifications.fantasticFridays: Fantastic Fridays rewards you with amazing deals and exclusive experiences any day of the week. Would you like to check them out?

insufficientFunds.single: Your balance is too low for your plan to renew on {{renewalDate}}
insufficientFunds.multi: {{connectionName}}'s balance is too low for their plan to renew on {{renewalDate}}

fridayDeals.single: Would you like to check out the latest Fantastic Friday Prepay deals?
fridayDeals.multi: Would you like to check out the latest Fantastic Friday Prepay deals for {{connectionName}}?

topupSaveCardSuccess.single: You topped up ${{topupAmount}}. Your card ending {{lastFourDigits}} has been saved.
topupSaveCardSuccess.multi: {{connectionName}}'s topped up ${{topupAmount}}. Your card ending {{lastFourDigits}} has been saved.

topupSaveCardFailure.single: You topped up ${{topupAmount}}. Your card ending {{lastFourDigits}} wasn't saved. Tap below to add your card manually.
topupSaveCardFailure.multi: {{connectionName}}'s topped up ${{topupAmount}}. Your card ending {{lastFourDigits}} wasn't saved. Tap below to add your card manually.

planAndAddOns.title: Plan & Add-Ons
planAndAddOns.renewalInfoCancelled: Your plan has been cancelled and ends in {{remainingDays}} on {{renewalDate}}
planAndAddOns.renewalInfoOnHold: Your plan has been put on hold
planAndAddOns.planInfoNoEntitlements: To see the data, mins or TXTs available on this plan, please check your Add-Ons below. If you haven’t purchased any Add-Ons, casual rate will apply.
planAndAddOns.onHoldWarning: You don't have enough credit for your plan to renew. Top up to get going again.
planAndAddOns.cancelPlanConfirmationMessage: If you cancel now, your {{planName}} won't renew on {{renewalDate}}.
planAndAddOns.browseAvailable: Browse through our exciting Add-Ons offering great value.
planAndAddOns.error: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.

activeAddOn.title: Active Add-On
activeAddOn.onHoldWarning: You didn’t have enough credit for your Add-On to renew. Top up to get going again.
activeAddOn.buyNowConfirmation: Are you sure you want repurchase this Add-On? If you do, you’ll lose any unused {{entitlements}} you currently have with this Add-On.
activeAddOn.cancelAddOnConfirmationMessage: If you cancel now, your {{addOnName}} Add-On won't renew on {{renewalDate}}.
